attributes.title: Not worth it
attributes.review: Full of glitches. I had to give all my information away. I should have never downloaded.

attributes.title: worst app
attributes.review: Downloaded this app to try and contact Barron so we could run away together but some orange guy kept getting in my way. Would not recommend.

attributes.title: Broke my phone
attributes.review: To anyone like me, who was hoping to get updates on our esteemed president’s campaign, DO NOT DOWNLOAD!! This entire app it communist propaganda and downloads a virus that turns all of your news fake.

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: took SO long to download then even longer to load and it kept crashing

attributes.title: Devil
attributes.review: This app ruined my phone so much as soon as I downloaded it made my phone get all glitchy and when I feted it it went away... so trump the devil broke my phone 😭

attributes.title: The Worse App ever
attributes.review: First it’s slow to open and won’t even show anything I close the app completely still nothing.

attributes.title: LETS THE CHINESE STEAL YOUR INFORMATION
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to help the President on his amazing mission to keep all the liberal snowflakes out of government but I downloaded it and then got spammed by emails in Chinese and my bank account was hacked and all my money was stolen

attributes.title: Oh Dear
attributes.review: This app doesn’t work as it should. It is full of bugs and, crashes without notice. Needs improving & a serious upgrade

attributes.title: DANGEROUS
attributes.review: Horribly dangerous app that spreads harmful propaganda through false truths. This app is for people who are too lazy to look up their own information and will resort to what comforts them instead of reality🤮 This app is dangerous for America and it’s citizens.

attributes.title: Not from tik tok btw
attributes.review: So it took 24 million years to download and not only that but after I opened the app there was a hitler shrek awaiting me then It said take my hand and show me the land and then proceeded to tell me Im a poppy head
